title: Except for the row houses or for the internal staircase of a duplex tenement, no staircase shall be made of wooden or other combustible material
clause_text: Except for the row houses or for the internal staircase of a duplex tenement, no staircase shall be made of wooden or other combustible material.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Except for the row houses or for the internal staircase of a duplex tenement, no staircase shall be made of wooden or other combustible material.
